response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your business operations. This exceptional piece is valued at $1,500,000 to us, reflecting its unparalleled quality and capabilities. We are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1,250,000, aiming to provide you with a substantial value proposition while ensuring a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your interests and budget, so we can proceed to discuss further details.", "product_price": 1250000}
